name: EarfTopium
description:
This is EarfTopium!( Our game for the 'The Back to School Game Jam') Game jam. The theme for the game jam was 'Trees'. 

A few weeks ago.. On a planet far far away.. On someplace called  'EarfTopium' astronauts landed.. But little did they know.. They were not alone.. The things that we call trees on earth, are not what they seem on this planet.. The trees are alive.. The trees killed those astronauts! Those astronauts were my friends! Now I seek revenge, on all the trees on that planet.. I am going to kill every last one of them, but I need your help. Do you think you can help me? If so, download this game and help me kill some trees!

Key Features
  • Kill Trees!
  • 5+ Maps to shoot and kill the trees in!
  • You can use over 4 guns to shoot the trees with! The Sniper, Pistol, Machine Gun, AK-47 and even a Shotgun !
  • There are 3 game modes in the game! Target Practice, Level Mode and Survival Mode!
  • A great soundtrack by Ryan Udairam!
  • 20+ minutes of gameplay!
  • A completely voiced protagonist!
Controls
  • W A S D or Arrow Keys to move.
  • Shift to sprint.
  • Space to jump.
  • Esc to exit in-game back to main menu.
  • Right click to shoot.
